/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about the rules-based processing of dependency claims, including
purpose RBPS
how RBPS
receives data necessary to process a claim
, and
sorts and processes claims
requests that are not eligible for automated processing through RBPS
handling claims
with missing claim documents
, and
automatic release of decision notices that reflect a denial of entitlement to additional benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section D - Dependency Claims Processed by the Rules-Based Processing System (RBPS)
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section D
